title: Mirror of Germany. No. 165 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: At Nurburgring the 6th world championship for sports cars and prototypes was held and Porsche cars dominated the race; information of the Federal Institute for Labour Placement and Unemployment Insurance is given; at Brunswick a modern camera factory employs 2000 people and its products are exported to 163 countries; a visit to Flensberg on the German-Danish border; singing star Mireille Mathieu makes a tour of Germany; famous architect, Scharoun, is honoured by an exhibition of his work in Berlin; German Gymnastic Festival included a week of festivities and a fireworks display.
related_objects: Series; S01482; Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel; Active
